comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey, Fall is the season of nostalgia, and I got nostalgiac for Sanitas. Did the duathlon a day early. Holy cow that's a steep sucker. My legs acted as if they'd never been there before... Like, "Hey we don't do stuff like this! We're tired! We want to go home!" That kind of nonsense. I had to remind them that the three of us (me, left, right) used to make a regular diet of climbs like Sanitas, but they just acted stupid and surly. We all left in a bad mood.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: DU, et al.: Since you already hit Sanitas today, perhaps we can undertake another adventure run I've been eyeing of late: find the connector trail between Sunshine Canyon and the Anemone Trail so as to permit a nice loop....
